Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: I think both forms of feedback helped me in different ways. The GenAI helped me to make immediate changes and provided me with feedback instantly whereas the teachers usually took about a week to provide feedback but it was much more detailed and helped me refine my work wholistically (the ideas, structure and meeting the needs of the task)

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: GenAI made me feel less stressed as I could pick and choose which pieces of advice I was going to listen to and act on. The teachers however, did sometimes make me negative about my work.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: AI was better organised and formatted so it was eaier to read but the teachers was often orally delievered or written in paragraphs.
